word: H1931 - הוּא - hûwʼ - hoo - He - அவன்

sections.paragraph: அது, அந்த, இது, இந்த, அவர்கள், இவர்கள், அவள், அவன், அவைகள், அவை, அதே, இவள், - பிரதிபெயர்ச்சொல்

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: The second form is the feminine beyond the Pentateuch; a primitive word, the third person pronoun singular, he (she or it); only expressed when emphatic or without a verb; also (intensively) self, or (especially with the article) the same; sometimes (as demonstrative) this or that; occasionally (instead of copula) as or are: - he, as for her, him (-self), it, the same, she (herself), such, that (. . . it), these, they, this, those, which (is), who.
